>>>>>>>>>>> Вт, 8 апр. 2025 г. в 12:51, 每天只吃半碗饭_ <lillian@simsonn.com>:
>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>> Good afternoon, my friend!
>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>> I am glad to receive your reply. This is the first time I heard
>>>>>>>>>>>> about Parents' Day. I hope you can spend this important holiday with your
>>>>>>>>>>>> family. I have received your delivery address. I will arrange to send the
>>>>>>>>>>>> package to you as soon as possible in the next two weeks and send you the
>>>>>>>>>>>> logistics tracking number at that time. Please don't worry.
>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>> In addition, the main upgrade points of our pedal that you need
>>>>>>>>>>>> to reflect in the evaluation video are as follows, mainly to let more
>>>>>>>>>>>> racing users understand our upgrades and improvements. You can prepare the
>>>>>>>>>>>> script in advance based on this.
>>>>>>>>>>>> Our upgrades this time include:
>>>>>>>>>>>> 1. Comprehensive optimization of the brake pedal damping system
>>>>>>>>>>>> and feel (improved braking principle, two-stage braking system, shortened
>>>>>>>>>>>> spring travel to simulate the feel of real brake pads, and damping
>>>>>>>>>>>> materials).
>>>>>>>>>>>> 2. Upgraded hydraulic buffer system: Provides a real hydraulic
>>>>>>>>>>>> feel - throttle one-way hydraulic pressure, brake and clutch two-way
>>>>>>>>>>>> hydraulic pressure.
>>>>>>>>>>>> 3. The thickness of the plate has been fully upgraded, and the
>>>>>>>>>>>> texture has been significantly improved.
>>>>>>>>>>>> 4. The main control box has been fully upgraded, and the
>>>>>>>>>>>> throttle clutch has added anti-EMI components, and the anti-interference
>>>>>>>>>>>> ability has been doubled.
>>>>>>>>>>>> 5. Added 80HA soft limiter to reduce frustration when the pedal
>>>>>>>>>>>> reaches the maximum stroke and improve comfort.
>>>>>>>>>>>> 6. Simsonn Manager software has been fully upgraded to improve
>>>>>>>>>>>> the user experience.
>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>> Thanks again for your enthusiasm and let me know if you have
>>>>>>>>>>>> any further concerns or questions.
>>>>>>>>>>>> Best wishes,
>>>>>>>>>>>> Lillian
>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>

>>>>>>>>>>>> Пн, 7 апр. 2025 г. в 06:36, 每天只吃半碗饭_ <lillian@simsonn.com>:
>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>> Good morning Maxim Provalny.
>>>>>>>>>>>>> I am very sorry to reply you just now. A few days ago was the
>>>>>>>>>>>>> Qingming Festival in China. I had three days off and needed to go back to
>>>>>>>>>>>>> my hometown to worship my ancestors, so I didn't see your email in time.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>> Thank you very much for your enthusiasm and cooperation
>>>>>>>>>>>>> intention. Our cooperation mainly requires you to introduce and display our
>>>>>>>>>>>>> products and brands in an all-round way, and fully highlight the upgraded
>>>>>>>>>>>>> points of our pedals to the majority of racing users. We hope that through
>>>>>>>>>>>>> your evaluation video, more people can understand our brand. We will
>>>>>>>>>>>>> provide you with the latest upgraded pedals in our store and detailed
>>>>>>>>>>>>> instructions. If you have any ideas and specific cooperation content, you
>>>>>>>>>>>>> can also let us know.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>> If there is no problem, you can send me your delivery address.
>>>>>>>>>>>>> I expect to send you our upgraded products this week.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>> Looking forward to your reply and hope that we can smoothly
>>>>>>>>>>>>> reach cooperation in the future!
>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>> Best wishes
>>>>>>>>>>>>> Lillian
>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>

>>>>>>>>>>>>> Чт, 3 апр. 2025 г. в 13:38, 每天只吃半碗饭_ <lillian@simsonn.com>:
>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Hi Maxim Provalny!
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> I'm Lillian, the manager of SIMSONN (a manufacturer of
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> simulated racing equipment). I received your email expressing your
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> intention to cooperate. We are very happy that you are willing to review
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> our products. I also browsed your homepage and videos on YouTube. The
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> content is professional and well done. We are also happy to cooperate with
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> you.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Our current Pro Plus and Pro X pedals have been fully
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> upgraded. We are very confident in this upgrade. Our mission is to make the
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> best simulated racing equipment available to more people with limited
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> budgets. We believe it will redefine the market with excellent cost
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> performance. We will provide our new products and hope that you can make a
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> detailed functional demonstration video to highlight the upgraded and
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> improved functions of the upgraded pedals. We are very much looking forward
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> to working with you and value your profound feedback.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Our upgrade this time includes:
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> 1. Comprehensive optimization of the brake pedal damping
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> system and feel (improved braking principle, two-stage braking system,
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> shortened spring travel to simulate the feel of real brake pads, and
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> upgraded damping materials).
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> 2. Upgraded hydraulic buffer system: Provides real hydraulic
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> feel-one-way hydraulic pressure for throttle, two-way hydraulic pressure
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> for brake and clutch.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> 3. The thickness of the plate has been fully upgraded, and
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> the texture has been significantly improved.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> 4. The main control box has been fully upgraded, and the
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> throttle clutch has added anti-EMI components, and the anti-interference
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> ability has been doubled.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> 5. Added 80HA soft limiter to reduce the frustration when the
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> pedal reaches the maximum stroke and improve comfort.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> 6. Simsonn Manager software has been fully upgraded to
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> improve user experience.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Looking forward to your reply, you can contact me if you have
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> any questions.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Best wishes,
>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Lillian
